Great 1st step' as the country Sudan lifts the death penalty and beating (flogging) for gay sex. They should just throw 'em in the ocean instead.

Could you please stop using bottom? I get that you have the whole gender/sexuality change thing going on and its fun to play with that and stretch the limits of gendered terms, but long term its going to fuck up the language and make finding the threads we actually want inconvenient for everyone involved. Besides, theres already way too much overlap for normies, especially in the third world where there isnt even an understanding that gay people arent the same as trans people. Lets not make things any more convoluted than they need to be, keeping up with all this is hard as it is and besides, they are becoming a real problem in society. The last thing either of us want is picky women thinking they can call themselves fucking bottoms because its 'gender neutral now', its getting ridicilous now and pandering to them has got to stop.
